metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48579 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
UnRAR before 6.2.3 allows extraction of files outside of the destination folder via symlink chains.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48579` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar-headers - 1:6.2.6-1
libunrar5 - 1:6.2.6-1
unrar - 1:6.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:6.2.6-1').
